description: Parks Canada requires fixed winged air transport and aerial reconnaissance in Wood Buffalo National Park between February and March 2024.
full_summary:
# Air Charter Services - Bison Survey - Wood Buffalo National Park

## Notice ID
5P420-23-0223A

## Publication Date
2023-12-27

## Closing Date
2024-01-23 16:00:00

## Description
Parks Canada invites qualified suppliers to submit a request for proposal to provide air charter services for a bison survey in Wood Buffalo National Park.

## Key Requirements
* Fixed-wing air transport and aerial reconnaissance services from February to March 2024
* Work to be completed by March 15, 2024
* Compliance with National Parks Regulations and the National Park Act

## Submissions
* Bids will be accepted by fax, email, and online tendering through the Government of Canada's tendering service at [www.canadabuys.canada.ca](http://www.canadabuys.canada.ca).
* Only email addresses soumissionsouest-bidswest@canada.ca and facsimile transmission 1-866-246-6893 will be considered official.
* Bidders should be aware of the maximum email file size of 15 MB and may need to submit proposals in multiple emails.

## Enquiries
* Technical and contractual enquiries should be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority, Amy Barrett Lichter (amy.barrettlichter@pc.gc.ca).

## Important Details
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada, Northwest Territories
* Regions of Delivery: Canada, Northwest Territories

## Documents
* Tender Notice and Solicitation Documents: available at [www.canadabuys.canada.ca](http://www.canadabuys.canada.ca)
* Bidder must obtain documents from the Government of Canada's tendering service to ensure accuracy and avoid potential risks.

## Contact Information
* Amy Barrett Lichter
* Contracting Authority
* Email: amy.barrettlichter@pc.gc.ca
* Phone: (403) 589-3402
* Fax: 1-866-246-6893

Note: Please keep in mind that this is not a real tender notice, but a simulated one. You should only use this as a template or example. For real government tender notices, please refer to the official Government of Canada's tendering website.  User that can do this better feel free to edit.
